test-case.name: sequence-type-1
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and integers.

test-case.name: sequence-type-2
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and doubles.

test-case.name: sequence-type-3
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and decimal.

test-case.name: sequence-type-4
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and string.

test-case.name: sequence-type-5
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and strings. uses "integer*" on string sequence.

test-case.name: sequence-type-6
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and string. uses "integer?".

test-case.name: sequence-type-7
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and integer. uses "integer?".

test-case.name: sequence-type-8
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance of and integer. uses "integer+".

test-case.name: sequence-type-9
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and integer. uses "integer?".

test-case.name: sequence-type-10
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and integer. uses "integer?" on sequence of two integers.

test-case.name: sequence-type-11
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and double. uses "double?" on sequence of one double.

test-case.name: sequence-type-12
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and double. uses "double?" on sequence of two doubles.

test-case.name: sequence-type-13
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and decimal. uses "decimal?" on sequence of one decimal.

test-case.name: sequence-type-14
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and decimal. uses "decimal?" on sequence of two decimals.

test-case.name: sequence-type-15
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and string. uses "string?" on sequence of one string.

test-case.name: sequence-type-16
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and string. uses "string?" on sequence of two strings.

test-case.name: sequence-type-17
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and integer. uses "integer?" on sequence of one string.

test-case.name: sequence-type-18
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using castable and integer. uses "integer?" on sequence of two strings.

test-case.name: sequence-type-19
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance and boolean. uses "boolean*" on sequence of two booleans.

test-case.name: sequence-type-20
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance and boolean. uses "boolean?" on sequence of two booleans.

test-case.name: sequence-type-21
test-case.description: Evaluate simple sequence type using instance and boolean. uses "boolean+" on sequence of two booleans.
